name: UI та стилізація
description: ОБОВ'ЯЗКОВІ правила для UI компонентів та стилізації

rules.instructions: UI and Styling Rules - MANDATORY === COLOR SYSTEM (CRITICAL) === ✅ ALWAYS use Shadcn UI CSS variables: - bg-background, text-foreground - bg-card, text-card-foreground, border-border - bg-primary, text-primary-foreground - bg-muted, text-muted-foreground ❌ NEVER use: - Direct Tailwind colors: bg-blue-500, text-gray-700 - Hex codes: #3b82f6 - Custom color classes - Gradients without approval === SPACING SYSTEM === ✅ ONLY use these values: - gap-2, p-2 (8px) - minimum spacing - gap-4, p-4 (16px) - DEFAULT for most cases - gap-6, p-6 (24px) - between sections - gap-8, p-8 (32px) - between large blocks ❌ NEVER use: - gap-3, gap-5, gap-7, p-3, p-5 - Arbitrary values: p-[13px] - Margin when gap can be used === COMPONENTS === ✅ ALWAYS use Shadcn UI components: - Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardDescription, CardContent - Button with variants: default, outline, ghost, destructive - Input, Label, Textarea - Select, SelectTrigger, SelectContent, SelectItem - Table, TableHeader, TableBody, TableRow, TableCell - Dialog, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogTitle - Badge with variants: default, secondary, destructive - Alert, AlertTitle, AlertDescription ❌ NEVER: - Create custom button/input/card components - Use native HTML elements directly: ``` === STRICT PROHIBITIONS === ❌ NEVER: 1. Inline styles: style={{color: 'red'}} 2. Direct colors: bg-blue-500, text-gray-700 3. Custom UI components 4. Non-standard spacing: p-3, gap-5 5. Arbitrary values: p-[13px] 6. Different patterns on same page 7. Native elements:
